ygData.subject: Re: Dagnor's Cauldron
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, Mages spells aren t just waving of hands, they have to speak the words too.  Not to mention, have you ever tried moving your hands quickly underwater, it
ygData.messageBody:
Well, Mages spells aren't just waving of hands, they have to speak the words
too. Not to mention, have you ever tried moving your hands quickly
underwater, it doesn't work, you would think this would make songs and
spells tougher to get off underwater. However water doesn't seem to effect
it.

Wenaddar


> -----Original Message-----
> From: andreas.mangs@... [SMTP:andreas.mangs@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 3:59 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Dagnor's Cauldron
>
> From: andreas.mangs@...
>
> How can a bard sing underwater anyway???
>
> Drokk, da majik trollie
>
> Tony Cawthorne wrote:
>
> > From: "Tony Cawthorne" <tac1@...>
> >
> > hehehe until the bard takes a hit and his song is interupted
> >

> > >
> > > Several caster classes get the spell. The bardsong is a party song,
> so
> > > it won't wear off in the middle of a battle.
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----

> night
> > > > on
> > > > > the Rathe. He went inside solo earlier and said that he was the
> > > > only
> > > > > person in the zone. It is just a really tough place since you
> have
> > > > to
> > > > > have water breathing, bard songs or Fishbone earrings to survive
> > > > long
> > > > > enough to fight.
> > > > >
> > > > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > > > From: Tony Cawthorne [SMTP:tac1@...]

> > > > > > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > > > > > Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Dagnor's Cauldron
> > > > > >
> > > > > > From: "Tony Cawthorne" <tac1@...>
> > > > > >
> > > > > > In the water there somewhere in Dagnor's is the entrance to
> > > > another
> > > > > > dungeon
> > > > > > called "Kedge Keep" the entire dungeon is underwater and the
> > > > entrance
> > > > > > is
> > > > > > guarded by two lvl 35+ swordfish, and it gets worse from there
> on
> > > > in.
> > > > > > Not
> > > > > > much more info but hopefully a little more than ye knew b4!
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Quindinar
> > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > From: <Jesper.Sallander@...>

> to
> > > > > > Unrest,
> > > > > > but
> > > > > > > does anyone know anything else about this place? The only
> thing
> > > > > > I've seen
> > > > > > > there is Goblin Tidal Lords, which are WAAY red for me. Is
> this
> > > > the

> zone?
> > > > I
> > > > > > know
